Marked One.. made it this far eh, look like crap though! Well... come on in then before the military come back... Oh, and watch your back... your reputation precedes you!
Hope you have plenty of ammo.. things have changed since you first came through here!
Keep vigilant Marked One.. you are being hunted..
Marked One .. there was an old man here that was claiming to be a gun smith from the Red Forest .. Said was making a special weapon for a new faction.
He claims it was stashed in a blocked tunnel when his workshop was raided by bandits, might be worth a look..
MARKED ONE.. why are you back? ... Let us be... let us sleep.
BANDITS... Beware of the MARKED ONE... You'll find no mercy there!
ARENA
MOD DELETED
Potap
You can once again use the services of a local network. Best of luck!
PDA Reminder
Bullseye, take my legs-you may have noticed!
Detonator
Explosives failed to detonate! Target not found...
Explosives failed to detonate! Position unstable...
Explosives
Blown up at another location
Here a strange place ...
Detonator Error!
Explosives detonated!
Nothing has blown up!
Timer is running! Urgent need to put it and retreat to a safe distance.
babah obj == nil: id
, name
Radio not available during blowout!
To use the repair kit you should stay in the car!
You have found one of the unique cars! More remain to be found
You've found all the unique autos! Received award: M-134 Minigun 'Plus', Carton FMJ 5.56x45mm
out of 6.
I went to the attic but could not find the bars!\nI will hunt down and kill the person that took them!
Marked One, are you still alive? Are you bringing my book?\nHope I see you soon, please be careful out there!
What about that tunnel and those gold bars?\nWhy has the energy levels gone up near the NPP and not in it?\nSomething is...
to the entrance of the base is disabled
to the exit of the base is disabled
to the entrance of the secret cave is disabled
to the entrance of the secret cave on Recon will close within a few hours
trap disabled
to the entrance of the hospital three compartment disabled
blocking exit from the compartment disabled
Strelok, any news. The time will come - have a look.
Strelok, any news. The time will come - have a look, people came for the casket. Yes, the detector will not forget.
Strelok, Cyclops opened the safe. In short, waiting.
Arrows, there is a change in orders. How to find the floppy disk - have a look.
Strelok, I know, the old card you have. Make a copy of it, but without my marked transitions. The copy you give Astrologer.
Sent to you Novis - let's see what he can tell us about the mercenaries he decided to join..
Sidorovich, you ordered. If you want to live - the photos, Strelok, came from the front and in profile.
Strelok, is heading for Taynichok, come...
Strelok, is not a divorce. Do not be surprised ... We must meet, to hide more makes no sense. I'm waiting for you at the Pilgrim on our new database, make haste.
Teleport to the secret area within the Warlab has been deactivated....
You got involved Soldier ... now you pay the Piper ... HAHAHAHA!!!....
You guys are full of shit! I've been carrying these stupid Artifacts on my belt for 3 months now and nothing. Absolutely Nothing! And today half of them turned to dust, crumbled apart!
I hope you are happy, and that the same misfortune awaits you, be warned STALKER!
Strelok ... we have left the Warlab. A large pack of Pseudodogs attacked in the night ... we lost three good men... I will meet you at the Bar ... you know the drill...
Strelok ... There is news going around, turn yourself...
Teleport to the secret area within the Warlab has been deactivated... not sure how ... or why...
Receiving signal from Yantar - looking good so far ... will report back in once the test phase is complete ... switching coordinates to 4-8-15-16-23-42 ...
Marked One ... you're just visiting the area, so nobody knows you yet ... there's a farm nearby some ruins - come across it yet?
This guy, he wanted to travel to the Perimeter, and I promised him some money for the trip. Help me out.. give to him 70,000ru. Then come see me. I will repay you.. with interest.
I saw a group of Mercenaries in the Garbage - perhaps on a job or doing reconaissance. Be careful
Just spotted a motorized group of Spetsnaz moving through the Cordon... Looked as if they're searching for someone...
Sidorovich ... you had better have something useful for me when I get back... or it's your head on a platter... do we understand each other?!
I can offer upgrades for various weapons, and jobs for those who wish to earn favours, and discounted prices. Soon I will be in Agroprom
I'm at the Bar. Need somebody to find something for me. I'll pay generously for the work .. come see me
I'm having the same problem as the rest of you - some of my Artefacts have transformed, and became useless cobblestones... fucking bullshit!!!
Looking forward to meeting up with you at the Bar in Rostock.. make sure you have my money ... and the map..
The soldier, you're on the spot. Look carefully in the direction of the Military Outpost. He's yours. Look, do not kill him...
Comrade!! .. Major Kuznetsov sends his regards ... I have your flash drive with me ...Meet me at the Research Institute two days from now .. bring the photos!!
Marked One .. What the hell do you want!? If you haven't been seen by the Doctor yet, you may still be infected .. or worse ...
If you talk with the Doctor, and drink his funky medicine - then come see me, and we'll have ourselves a little chat.
Welcome back STALKER... That medicine seems to have helped... Well...except for your looks though, too bad...
Good to hear from you Strelok ...did you find that Lab you went looking for without us?! See you at the Bar .. we'll have some drinks ..
You'll find us at one of the fires in the far warehouse behind the Arena
FANG .. the teleport to a secret part of the Lab, I disabled it ... I'll explain later
Strelok, how are things going? Switching to a private channel ..
Barkeep ... I'm at Yantar. Found two of my predecessors down here... You can send a death notice to their relatives if you like... they won't be coming home..
I will be back to settle up with you soon... Ticket Number: 89115683244.
Marked One ... I sent those relatives the death notice's and a little bit of money - 50,000 rubles Thanks for the information.. Best of luck to you
Captain! We've caught another Eccentric. Looted him thoroughly. Left for you, since you were the one that suggested the trap in the first place. Let's throw a party when you get back
Marked One!! Take out my troops will you?! ...See you in the village when I return soon. For you, I'll prepare a special enemma with Tobasco Sauce.. HAHA!!!
Panther, where are you? Any news, we must see.
Kolmogorov, the village surveyed. Return.
Hello, krasavcheg. I have a problem, had to quickly make his feet. I'm on the bogs, some cape. Where exactly - I do not know, but here is visible some sort of observation tower.
Throw off the approximate coordinates space in your PDA - see map Bolow.
Well, eagles, are you ready? I know for many this will be the last battle. We must punish them! Many lives in your hands. Takes the position turntables on approach. Good luck.
Hey, guys ... If anyone still alive ... This is a victory! We kicked their ass! Strelok, great job. I'm waiting for you at headquarters.
Fang, here is the deal ... Look at the map, or both may know - need trail through swamps in the direction of the old village.
I'll not be alone. I fear my companion does not get through the whole Zone ... Piligrim helped - he still remains in the Village.
Strelok, listen carefully. Map of wetlands has changed. Previously was a transition towards the village of dilapidated railway bridge, where the cave. But now there does not pass.
Not sure, but the path is now to start somewhere before the bridge ... Approximate coordinates I throw off. Next - look in the box
Strelok, there is an urgent matter. Pilgrim was trapped in the new territory.
Details I do not know. Sending the coordinates - he was in Pripyat, now... go see the Black Doctor in Limansk, should help you find him... so move quickly!
Strelok, there are problems in your case. You cannot do without the aid. If you're near Warlab - have a look.
Strelok, we have problems - or rather me. Panther and along with him Pilgrim have vanished. Hell knows where they disappeared to - in the village until it feels calm. You do not know?
Pilgrim, what's going on? Where are you and Panther?
Girlfriend has fled. I have pre-planted a bug, but radius is just a couple of kilometres. Lost signa, not walking.. must be by vehicle, I even run on shortcuts but could not catch up..
Judging by everything - no one is - met with someone. The last signal is caught from the Red Forest. Wait a village in return, you must inform Kolmogor
A request to all - please do not open fire on my helicopter. This is a legal mobile commerce in the Zone. If you have bulk items to sell, we'll be landing shortly near the Agroprom railway tunnel...
I know that Panther needs me alive. You should not try to blackmail me, I am much like you, but I still have a conscience and the notion of friendship, which makes me doubly dangerous.
Hi, this is Panther. I hope the message will come after my escape, because I know that you stop me if I told you this before. I sent a SMS with the threat against his older brother...
I do not want to lose, so go to this meeting. With whom, and what they want from me, and what will happen next - is unknown. Sorry ... Kolmogor not need to say anything...
The chief said that you were mistaken. We have no girlfriend - neither one nor the second. The approximate location of one of them - Generators.
The chief also said thank you to you - the one dish that you bring maple - it was stolen two days ago, just with a generator. End of line.
Fang, hello. Need a trail in the direction of the generators. Help me out.
Hello. It was the path from the station. Ghost expert on that area, now get back to him.
Strelok, hello, old man. There is a path with NPP1, though there's a long time I did not used to go.
Let's go together. I'll wait for you to NPP1 at the exit trail from NPP2 - this transition you must know. Prior to the meeting.
Yes, I know this place. Ge ... You have decided to take a walk with me? See you soon.
Strelok, things were bad. I do not see the leader of punishers. Low vertuha went for a second landing on the other side of the village, and he is obviously there.
While we're holding the fort - your task to clean up. A man. Your cannon will help you in this
Strelok, I still remained in the country. You'll be close - sign - to discuss a plan of action.
Strelok, buzz off from there, quick! Another few seconds and you're dead!!
Keith, hello, it's Countryman. Tonight the base generators scientist and I escaped.
Do you have a head light, you will close - sign - think about what to do. What would have followed him in the guest to Monolith
Looks like a stalker, you failed my mission. Time out. Come.
Pipets. Some idiot to shoot at us. Suicide.
I spotted the enemy that was firing at our helicopter. Blast his ass!
All data transfers have finished. To hell with this freak. Up out lest that Schwarzenegger get the bottom of the Bazooka.
That blah, this asshole has struck turbine... We're on fire!!
I gave this android a piece of the monolith in the well... stuffed!!
Wait, stalker. Without permission of our elder you can not miss. Go to the countryman - he's in charge here.
I may be dumb, but I have excellent hearing. I heard your conversation. Can you pass..
Countryman, here with us guests arrived. Send one to you. Wait.
Something you often to the scientist. Skorifanilis? Okay, okay, kidding. Come.
Well you give! Do you have in there, bees to honey? You walk in 5 minutes! Okay, moving on.
Please do not worry and all remain on the ground. We will be landing a chopper with guests. They reported that they fly with peaceful purposes.
Strelok, I finished the conversation with Andersen. Tell this to the true Aryans, who it protects, so I let it go.
The men, who are alive - let the subway - the leader leaves!!
It seems there is another chopper. Here blah...
Doctor, I have here a hitch. Man found, but he was drunk and did not reach the generators. Ruin, curse, but for us send a chopper to the Swamps
A helicopter was sent. Put forward side of the cemetery on a hill near the old church.
Ghost, this Strelok. Soon I will. This Bosun drunk as a boa constrictor. Any news?
Yes, Strelok, news is, and besides amusing. Waiting.
I'm on approach. Go up the hill, where the cemetery.
I noticed a group of bandits just under the clasp. You will have to deal with them - landing in front of them too dangerous. The helicopter is not armed. Before we pick-up.
Here blah. All something that is not so. Bosun, hide nearby, your drunken body needs me alive. And I'll deal with the Bandits.
Looks like everything is clear. Was a tall tale? I'll go for a second landing. Check just in case.
Bosun, spinner landed. Blow quickly in the helicopter!
I'm here in the helicopter. Well technically here. Oh, hell, I forgot to piss. I hope that does not fly for too long, otherwise.
Doc, Bosun died ... I know that there is no alternative ... Do not disable us without a psy-antenna.
First one disabled. It is set at the gates of the base. I walked.
The second antenna is also turned off - it is a bunker. Then look at me like an idiot - can be seen can not understand how I passed.
The people 20 people - well-armed and often - on the towers in white academic costumes. I went to a scientist - he repairs antenna.
Third antenna is not working. Girls nowhere in sight. Since scientists do not talk. I see chopper, preparing to take off, obviously. Now sit back for a moment at the campfire.
Ghost, while the psi-field is still active. I'll wait for the return of Bosun near the border of the field, have a couple of questions. Will have to agree how we will proceed.
Ghost, brought to you by the homeless education. A couple of hours he must be sober and adequate.
Banzai! Urine freaks! Ept ... What s ... here min guided, n. ... to! Hey, guys, who are close! Reassure the monkey on the tower! This is from ...
My head does not pick up! That bitch, I told him now, his spacesuit on ass bent, goat. Astronaut, his mother!!
Ghost, you hear? Here is a question ... Can robots swear like a cobbler?
Hey, world! I see you there stormed the Reichstag? In carefully - go to land, no hook - Black Doctor sent reinforcements.
They went through an underground tunnel and the girl was led away. Entrance to the tunnel located between the fire and the tower.
Guys, an the second chopper don't shoot! Panther, probably there.
Boss, it looks like we're too late. The girl is dead. Did everything they could.
Sapsan, send me a helicopter. I'm arriving in person. Maybe even something you can do.
Strelok, stay in place, I will soon arrive to the scene.
Guys, hold on - chopper skyrocketed, now would be ironed.
It seems that she is not alone - see the second helicopter - comes from the village. We decided to clamp pliers. It is necessary to disperse. I will come from the right flank.
Yes, you understand. Come to the right, and I am going through a broken gate.
E. .. You just take a look, what they are doing - it seems the second propeller is on our side.
Ghost. All ok, we go back. Need a plan to capture. Together, we will not do. I plan Fritz team up with his abilities.
Well, you gave. He did not... Well, I told you. Strong risk. Okay, come have a chat.
The doctor is again Strelok. Without your support we cannot take the base alone. I hope you get the hint. We are not heroes of the Matrix, with time to spare.
Fritz, a business proposal - there is an opportunity to polish your skills. We plan to walk to the base of the monolith, you're among those invited.
Going? For now, Andersen is a serious security, and you have the rare opportunity to blow the dust off your gun.
Sapsan here. The chief said that will help you.
Well, I'll stroll along with you. What exactly do you want? I've been on this basis.
That's fine. Once visited, you know that the other base has no fence. Stop there and wait for the signal. Do not sunk prematurely.
How will the noise - Check slaughtered his machine gun at anything that moves, except me, Ghost and girls. I hope you know what a girl looks like?
Got it, do it. How are the girls - I forget, but before I kill someone - I will ask about this.
Oh, boy, do not joke, otherwise I'll turn you into a cloud of molecules.
Got it, Strelok.
Fritz, thank you for your help. While I do not know how to repay you, but I sure will. You can stay at the base, if you want.
And not for that. I was quite enough thank you. Yes, I still stay on the base. I would need - find.
All boss is gone. I wait with a group to protect the base.
I write to you myself, though not very fond of this occupation. Looks like someone duped us. Found a corpse, but not hers. Although for you - it is probably very good news. Not for me.
Doc, your base that you are not satisfied? It's in my pile of problems and issues. Yes, I am glad that Panther alive, and glad you told me the truth.
I want my stolen artifact. That girl who dragged him, still not found. The second problem - I need energy, and two working generators are not enough.
In addition, control panels are located in Warlab. The door there is encrypted and who are now in the laboratory - is unknown
The code I know, and the door will open. I even know who is now in Warlab. And I know that your people there cannot go without protection.
I can contribute, but I need some information - namely, all that you have on the Astrologer - I understand that until recently he was your man.
All right. Try to open the door to Warlab. When - not in a hurry to leave - I will send to you my man. Meet him at the transition into the hospital.
You know where it is located - at the barrier, which is an old military road in the concrete generators. I'll give a file on the Astrologer. The rest - at the meeting.
Ghost, I contacted the doctor, rather, he contacted me. He was honored in the issue with Panther.
In short, I check the code, inspect the crossing and walk towards the transition to the hospital - there hands full of - Doc promised to send a dossier on the Astrologer.
Doc, I'm sorry, but your people hankering for a good artifact climbed into the anomalous zone. He was dead. The documents close, but getting them is now a problem.
Ghost, I'm on Undiscovered Land. Stay in here. You will see an Astrologer, do not touch him - I'll strangle him. Do not worry, Fang will help me..
Understand you. As for Black Doctors Think, I'm almost sure: it not strange that an eminent scientist distinguished stuffed corpse just arriving at the hospital?
I still cannot believe that the Peregrine Falcon in his mask did not see Fritz, that women don't see.. But the doctor? That's for your meditation while walking. Give Fang my greetings.
FANG, hello. It smells of roasted Astrologer. We must find the secret cave on Recon. I will try do it. Bury snaryagu, meet at our new headquarters. Yeah, the Ghost offers you greetings.
Hello. Long time no news from you, I really thought that the Maldives rest. I understand you, I'll be in the headquarters of unexplored Earth. Try to find out where is this cave.
Fang, I found a cave. In it there is someone, it seems - neutral. Probably Astrologer. Check can not - Teleport is still active.
I understand you - I am in the headquarters, come, let us discuss what to do. Alone in a cave not poke your nose - neutral-neutral, as you know what's on his mind.
We came. Occupy a position somewhere in the stones - in the case of uninvited guests.
Strelok, what have you got? What is so creepy screams? Something I can not recall such a crybaby.
Yes it would be better mutant ... Do not believe it - we found the girl who stole the artifact. Only fit for her - it happens in the Zone.
Leave until it and Blow up - it seems we have guests. I knew it would be...
We will fit. Prepare, but do not shoot too soon - look at the guests first.
And here is the company... Look, Strelok, looks like your girl goes willingly, at least she has a weapon. Now I'll shoot them a couple of shots of both.
It's not mine, and her chance to be missed. But I had fun, the master send-up. Shooting wait. Let's see what happens next, at least until they are only two.
It seems they want to talk, and obviously with you. Go and find out their last wishes, and I'll cover you. One hint of aggression on their part - and they are both dead.
Forgive me for troubling you again. I'm confused. Don't worry, not asking for help, do I have the most to understand all. Much of what is happening to me.. is not entirely clear.
Meanwhile, listen to what I do know: There is no draft O-consciousness, as well as not the Black Doctors.
Not passed for 5 minutes and you tortured my conscience? Or is this another trick? What kind of fiction you write? As this is not a Black Doctor?
My eyes still see something, however much they do not want to see - and this applies to you.
You set strongly against me, and my job required me to get the artifact is not feasible. With this I will have to resign. That's why I told you what I know.
Maybe this will help you find the true answer to the mystery of the Zone. And believe it or not - it's your business. Goodbye.
You're a good stalker and I'm glad you were my friend. And even more than the other...
Fang, all, I set sail on Warlab - to Maples. Here interesting information came at the expense of Black Doctors - must then be verified.
Strelok, you have not yet gone that far? Come back, like a girlfriend wants to talk. Seize the moment. By the way, her name is Fly.
That's not the road... Okay, back.
Strelok, I contacted the military. It was something ... Stirring citizens in uniform. We will send accurate information, wait. Yes, and energy not to aggravate.
Now - listen carefully. According to available data from the military side of the number 124 was shot down or hit by strong emissions over NPP2.
At the same time it has lost two helicopters - is evidence - in the same area. The exact location can be set getting a black box with this 124-th.
However, it is extremely problematic - the signal from the flight recorder comes from a roof destroyed 4 blocks...
Well, General, puzzled. Crap knows that now and do. In the area of radiation bulbs burn without electricity...
Decide. When you go, no one hero to think you will not - probably would be called crazy. Do you have any hint, where the girlfriend, if you still make up your mind to this madness.
Just in case, throw off your PDA in the photo of this aircraft.
Fang, beard with a recorder. Wert 124 on the roof disaster. Stop there - otherwise there. You take care of the girlfriend, but Panther together - let them weep, if I do not return.
Strelok, you have the roof torn off. Today the people have truth and to not go near a stall, and you go on the roof of a reactor. It's worth it? If you believe, go. You'd give to know.
FANG, I found this damn recorder. I went back to Voronin - let's decode.
Strelok, now that you're there. This can not be done - what are you, the military did not know? Return after decoding back to the station, they are checking all the coordinates.
Only one way out - look for yourself knocked chopper - they should not be so much. Pay attention to those where there are dead bodies in black Armor, it must be exactly the turntables.
Yes, you're right. First, he examined all lined helicopters.
Hey, how are you ... A. .. Strelok. Where's my granddaughter? Answer, mmmat!!
Well, and how are you ... General. I have your granddaughter, do not worry.
Okay, not dust. Sorry. Thank you found her, if it's true. Where can she be picked up?
True. Here's the coordinates for landing the helicopter. Dragonfly should be one, otherwise the rest of us wings alone, usual case for the Zone. Yes, Voronin, do not forget to thank.
Understood. Do not worry, gratitude, and do not forget about you. The helicopter flew from its base in 5 minutes.
Boys goodbye!! I love you and wait for a visit to Moscow!
Tob. General, the operation was successful. The girl was taken away, a box with a present left. We return to base.
DAMN, burning! What a hell of bazooka fired. Ah, I see them! In the fishing line on a hill - group of stalkers. That bitch! Move toward the cabin.
The machine does not obey the helm. Pull of the marsh, girlfriend need to push the water, can survive...
The machine does not obey the helm. Pull of the marsh, girlfriend need to push the water, can survive...
A Mmat, now ragged! Everybody jump overboard, alive! Fucking kitten...
What the fuck is going on there, soldiers?!
Poor thing, General. Heli shot down. Your granddaughter ... she ... she was heavily wounded. I send her and another soldier survived to the doctor.
It's not my fault. I will do everything in my power. I understand your feelings, but if there will be news - I'll contact you. Finish connection.
Doctor, here's coordinates. Need your help. Man died. A simple man, far from the Zone and from the mud of life. Try to do something. Objections will not be accepted.
I have things that interest you. But I think that life is expensive these wrappers.
All right. Helicopter crash. But I want to warn you of stasis - to adequately secure the camera on the resurrection I need energy. Now it is not enough.
You need to communicate with scientists at the generators and help them to start the third generator. After, if all goes well, will be another request.
Fang, Fly died. I am sending the body to the Black Doctor. He survived one of the soldiers - gave me a couple of photos of that knocked copter. This is a Monolith. And commanded them.
Our mutual friend - Astrologer.. They fired from the cave, where Fly was. Put forward there' can succeed this jerk kettle immediately loosen. As for cabin? Like Monolith to see you go.
Perished? I have attached to it a good girlfriend was... Everything is quiet so far. Look here... Do not touch her, if you see. I beg you. For this bitch I'll settle accounts.
Was Panther with him at the same time?? If so - they decided both. Word of prison detainees, even though I had long and tied up. These people have no right to life..
and our humane Court, which will seat 10 years for stealing the ruble, and the murder would conditionally couple of years will not help here. In the Zone - it's laws.
Fang, I'm on the spot. It seems, went to the children. Good luck to them. Do you still stay in the cabin, suddenly kids playground where, but I'm on generators with scientists
Need help to start the third generator. Yes, you see Panther - Do not touch her, plox.
Understood. There will be news - will tell. Say hello to Ghost.
Lucas, hello. Ask your intelligence - if you see Astrologer, let advised.
Voronin, hello, sir. We got no-go - you've probably aware of. Tell your people - see Astrologer - let advised.
Panther, answer.
PDA device switched off or out of network coverage...
Vitamin, hello. Here is the thing that is important for me. It is necessary to miss a couple of scientists from the surface to the control panel generators in Warlab.
These neutrals, and the people for whom they work - too
Hello, Strelok. Keeping in mind your help - I will say one thing - option acceptable to us, but these people will be a number of conditions.
Exit onto the surface of Warlab function - can send a man to negotiate. Waiting for your signal.
Doctor, please send your man to Generators.. freedom, those that are at Warlab, put forward a number of conditions for the passage of the scientists. Must discuss these conditions.
No problem. Tell Freedom, that we agree to discuss terms. Let him send a representative. Black Doctor will represent me.
The meeting will be at the entrance to Warlab from the generators, so that means you do not have to go.
Vitamin, dispatches one representative. Waiting.
Hello masters of Freedom. The essence of the negotiations, you know. Your environment?
Mutual greetings. I have been instructed to propose the following: We miss your scientists and provide unrestricted access to virtually all the necessary facilities.
Their protection also take care of our people. In exchange, you need half a million in cash and access to our soldiers on the surface
Preferably a barrier in the old concrete strip would like to organize a small camp to relax people and access control to a nearby transition. Naturally, your people have free access.
Been instructed to take all of your conditions. From finance, without any problems. As for the camp: this area is not yet under our supervision, to my knowledge just remnants fanatics.
But I have a solution - we send Strelok on the trimming of the territory, after which you can easily go Okay...
